MAP.NAME: mapExecStatus
MAP.COMMENT: Map the status of the conc prog execution message to ConcProgMsg

BRANCH.COMMENT: on the status of concurrent program execution

SEQUENCE.NAME: SUCCESS
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Conc Prog execution successful, search for the data error if any.

BRANCH.COMMENT: on the rowcount in Header Interface table

MAP.COMMENT: Append Temp Errors Doc to Errors Doc Record List

SEQUENCE.NAME: FAILED
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: conc prog fails due to some reason get the error message

MAP.NAME: mapExecErrorsStatus
MAP.COMMENT: MAP to get dbErrorMsg , program failure message
